title: Dhaka City Marathon
description: Pushed my limits in the heart of Dhaka! The buzzing city streets, cheering crowd, and electric atmosphere made this race unforgettable.

title: Cox's Bazar Beach Run
description: Running along the world’s longest sea beach? Count me in! The ocean breeze and golden sand made it feel like a dream.

title: Chattogram Challenge
description: This race had it all — elevation, excitement, and energy. Chattogram brought the heat and I loved every second of it!

title: Sylhet Green Run
description: Nature lovers’ dream! The Sylhet trails were lush, peaceful, and full of positive vibes. A perfect blend of fitness and fresh air.

title: Barisal Riverside Dash
description: Scenic river views and warm community cheers made Barisal a standout! A smooth, scenic dash by the water.

title: Rajshahi Heritage Marathon
description: A journey through time! Running past Rajshahi’s historic sites was both inspiring and motivating. Proud to be part of it.
